short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read YouTube videos instead of watching them.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays the YouTube video's caption track in a more readable fashion.
The language can be changed in the settings.
If the set language doesn't exist for the given video, the auto-translated track will be used.
